channel.title: rafting on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in rafting on Barefoot Rob

item.title: rafting yesterday with Simon
item.description: 08:35 Saturday 16 September 2017 JST Arms are sore after rafting yesterday, but generally had a great time. Got dumped a couple of times, and banged up my knees a bit on rocks, but I was wearing a helmet, so no worries. I am thankful my phone is waterproof!
